
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jellyai/p/18629192" title="发布于 2024-12-25 08:56">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">创建用于预测序列的人工智能模型，训练模型。</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3524016/202412/3524016-20241225085618577-1517815795.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>序言：</strong>我们在从事人工智能模型的研发时，当数据集，模型架构都准确好了，其实训练从代码角度来看，很简单粗暴。</p>
<p>训练模型</p>
<p>训练模型非常简单，只需调用 model.fit 方法，传入你的数据集，并指定训练的轮数（epochs）：</p>
<p>model.fit(dataset, epochs=100, verbose=1)</p>
<p>在训练过程中，你会看到损失函数（loss）从一个很高的数值开始，随着训练的进行会逐渐下降。以下是前 10 个训练轮次的结果：</p>
<p>Epoch 1/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 1s 15ms/step - loss: 898.6162</p>
<p>Epoch 2/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 8ms/step - loss: 52.9352</p>
<p>Epoch 3/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 8ms/step - loss: 49.9154</p>
<p>Epoch 4/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 7ms/step - loss: 49.8471</p>
<p>Epoch 5/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 7ms/step - loss: 48.9934</p>
<p>Epoch 6/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 7ms/step - loss: 49.7624</p>
<p>Epoch 7/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 8ms/step - loss: 48.3613</p>
<p>Epoch 8/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 9ms/step - loss: 49.8874</p>
<p>Epoch 9/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 8ms/step - loss: 47.1426</p>
<p>Epoch 10/100</p>
<p>45/45 [==============================] - 0s 8ms/step - loss: 47.5133</p>
<p>从结果可以看出，随着训练的进行，损失值逐渐降低，表明模型的性能在逐步提高。</p>
<p>**总结： **虽然训练的过程简单直接。然而，在训练中，仍需关注调优和可能遇到的复杂问题，以确保模型能够有效学习。</p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
